Author: DelicateFknFlower
Text: I agree. some of these posts commenting about boyfriends are extremely concerning to me. my boyfriend knows very well to never mentions numbers, gently encourages me to eat when I’m restricting, and constantly tells me that he loves every part of my body.   I’ve had previous boyfriends treat my ED like a joke and it takes a serious toll on your mental health.

Author: thoughtfulfox
Text: I feel the same as you!   My dad was the biggest contributor to me developing an ED. He was extremely verbally abusive about my weight and would restrict my access to food whenever I was at his house. This was so incredibly damaging. BUT, I haven’t seen him in four years now and I hope I never see him again.   For all you living with toxic family members: Cutting them out of your lives once you are financially stable enough to do so is one of the best things you’ll ever do for yourself. It won’t guarantee that things will get better, but it sure as hell makes it easier to heal.
